title: Fps drops?!?
body: i recently just had a game where i dropped to around 20-40 fps from my usual 270+... exited the match and instantly froze had to hard restart the computer. now leauge client wont load and brought me back to a later patch in the client.  Now it wont let me login to the client. my question is why the fuck am i going to have to suffer an afk ban  over this shit.. ?? heres to hoping i dont

replies.body:
"270 fps".. You realize your monitor cannot even begin to display a quarter of that, or half if it is an expensive 144hz panel, right?

Sounds like system instability, either incompatible or unstable (badly overclocked) hardware/software or an update (windows 10) that broke something.
If you overclocked anything recently, restore it to default clockspeeds.

Stop overworking your gpu for no reason, turn on vsync or framelimit (it will increase your image quality as well, on a lot of monitors), and make sure your gpu is functional and the drivers are not corrupted/outdated, clean any vents/fans, and make sure it is set as the preferred graphics adapter for games (especially if you are using a windows 10 laptop, they hate using the gpu for anything).
drivers are probably it too. i appreciate the help good sir have a good day but as a said in the last comment i do t overclock or anything like that

Check your graphics drivers. When FPS is a concern, it is most likely a hardware affect rather than server affect.

Can also check to make sure there is no throttling with your CPU or GPU.
okay ill have a look , just really frustrated. thanks
i dont overclock sir.dont assume shit i was not overworking it. its working fine now but thanks for being an asshole :) like i was expecting got the low priorty bull shit over a stupid client
